title: Authorizes the Long Island power authority to propose certain rate changes to the public service commission
summary: Authorizes the Long Island power authority to propose certain rate changes to the public service commission in the amount of two and one-half percent.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

           S. 2581                                                  A. 3614

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                             S E N A T E - A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 26, 2011
                                      ___________

       IN  SENATE  --  Introduced  by Sens. LAVALLE, FUSCHILLO, MARTINS -- read
         twice and ordered printed, and when printed to  be  committed  to  the
         Committee on Energy and Telecommunications

       IN  ASSEMBLY  --  Introduced  by  M.  of A. SWEENEY, HOOPER, WEISENBERG,
         LAVINE, SCHIMEL, RAMOS, ENGLEBRIGHT -- read once and referred  to  the
         Committee on Corporations, Authorities and Commissions

       AN  ACT  to amend the public service law, in relation to the Long Island
         power authority

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subdivision  1  of section 5 of the public service law is
    2  amended by adding a new paragraph i to read as follows:
    3    I. TO THE LONG ISLAND POWER AUTHORITY  AND/OR  ITS  SUBSIDIARIES  WHEN
    4  SUCH  AUTHORITY  SHALL  PROPOSE IMPLEMENTATION OF AN INCREASE IN AVERAGE
    5  CUSTOMER RATES EXCEEDING TWO AND ONE-HALF PERCENT OVER  A  TWELVE  MONTH
    6  PERIOD,  OR  TO  EXTEND  OR  REESTABLISH ANY PORTION OF A TEMPORARY RATE
    7  INCREASE OVER TWO AND ONE-HALF PERCENT; SUCH PROPOSED  INCREASE,  EXTEN-
    8  SION OR REESTABLISHMENT SHALL NOT BE IMPLEMENTED WITHOUT APPROVAL OF THE
    9  COMMISSION FOLLOWING A FULL EVIDENTIARY HEARING PURSUANT TO REGULATIONS.
   10    S 2. The public service law is amended by adding a new section 24-c to
   11  read as follows:
   12    S  24-C.  NOTICE  BY LONG ISLAND POWER AUTHORITY PRIOR TO CERTAIN RATE
   13  CHANGES. PURSUANT TO THE REQUIREMENTS OF PARAGRAPH I OF SUBDIVISION  ONE
   14  OF  SECTION FIVE OF THIS ARTICLE, THE LONG ISLAND POWER AUTHORITY AND/OR
   15  ANY OF ITS SUBSIDIARIES SHALL NOTIFY THE COMMISSION OF ANY PROPOSED RATE
   16  INCREASE EXCEEDING TWO AND ONE-HALF PERCENT OVER A TWELVE  MONTH  PERIOD
   17  OR  THE  EXTENSION OR REESTABLISHMENT OF ANY PORTION OF A TEMPORARY RATE
   18  INCREASE OVER TWO AND ONE-HALF PERCENT, AND SHALL COMPLY WITH APPLICABLE
   19  REGULATIONS OF THE COMMISSION FOR  EVIDENTIARY  HEARINGS  PRIOR  TO  THE
   20  IMPLEMENTATION OF ANY SUCH RATE CHANGE.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02907-01-1

       S. 2581                             2                            A. 3614

    1    S 3. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
    2  it  shall  have  become  a law; provided, that effective immediately the
    3  public service commission shall institute the proceedings  necessary  to
    4  review  and/or  amend  the  Long Island power authority's ongoing tariff
    5  filings  to  ensure  charges for the furnishing or rendition of electric
    6  power or of any related service at  the  lowest  level  consistent  with
    7  sound  fiscal  operating  practices  which provide for safe and adequate
    8  service; such proceedings shall be completed on or before such effective
    9  date; provided further, effective immediately the public service commis-
   10  sion and the Long Island power authority shall amend and/or  repeal  any
   11  rule  or  regulation necessary for the implementation of this act on its
   12  effective date and are authorized and directed to make and complete such
   13  rules or regulations on or before such effective date.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the Long Island power authority
